links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,0,-1,1).
maple: with(combstruct): SeqSeqSeqL := [T, {T=Sequence(S), S=Sequence(U, card > 1), U=Sequence(Z, card >1)}, unlabeled]: seq(count(SeqSeqSeqL, size=j), j=4..35); # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 04 2009]
crossrefs: I and J are A049856 while K and L are A059633 (with some offsets).
